Sentencas: Materials that exhibit considerable electronic conductivity and good stability in fuel atmospheres are interesting candidates to replace of Ni in its current collecting role in Ni-cermet solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) anodes.
Titulo: Niobia Based Rutile Materials as SOFC Anodes

Sentencas: The Nb1-xTixO2 rutile system offers particularly high electronic conductivity and has good chemical compatibility with SOFC components and seems an interesting candidate.
Titulo: Niobia Based Rutile Materials as SOFC Anodes

Sentencas: Of the three stable phases in the Nb2O5-TiO2 system, Nb2TiO7 was chosen as starting composition as it has the highest Ti content and so exhibits the highest conductivity when reduced to rutile.
Titulo: Niobia Based Rutile Materials as SOFC Anodes

Sentencas: Nb2TiO7 was prepared by standard solid state reaction at 1250 degrees C for 48 hours in air.
Titulo: Niobia Based Rutile Materials as SOFC Anodes

Sentencas: Under the reducing conditions of a SOFC anode at 930 degrees C, it is reduced to rutile Nb0.67Ti0.33O2.
Titulo: Niobia Based Rutile Materials as SOFC Anodes

Sentencas: The conductivity increases by about 4 orders of magnitude to about 300 Scm(-1) between air and fuel atmospheres and the p(O-2)(-1/6) dependence close to fuel conditions indicates n-type conductivity.
Titulo: Niobia Based Rutile Materials as SOFC Anodes

Sentencas: Impedance spectra of samples in both oxidising and reducing atmospheres were consistent with electronic domination; any ionic contribution seemed insignificant.
Titulo: Niobia Based Rutile Materials as SOFC Anodes

Sentencas: Symmetrical cell measurements of Nb2TiO7-x screen-printed electrodes on yttria stabilised zirconia in air were dominated by the series resistance of the electrodes.
Titulo: Niobia Based Rutile Materials as SOFC Anodes

Sentencas: Under reducing conditions the series resistance was very low; however, there were significant polarisation impedances and also a large diffusion limitation.
Titulo: Niobia Based Rutile Materials as SOFC Anodes

Sentencas: The poor electrochemical performance is thought to be related to very slow ionic diffusion in the niobate.
Titulo: Niobia Based Rutile Materials as SOFC Anodes

Sentencas: The polarisation resistance in air was similar in value to that in hydrogen, despite much lower electrode conductivity.
Titulo: Niobia Based Rutile Materials as SOFC Anodes

Sentencas: Despite the poor electrochemical performance this material still presents many attributes attractive for a current collection function.
Titulo: Niobia Based Rutile Materials as SOFC Anodes
